description.en: Educoin is a decentralized online skill learning platform for learners to improve their professional skills in future technologies. Educoin is building the future for online education and professional development with blockchain technology. We are creating an online Learning platform integrated with EduCoin to cut out the traditional payment method that usually has high exchange/transfer fee. And also to reach people in the world that do not have access to conventional payment method but do have crypto wallets. We aim to create financial benefits for the whole crypto and education ecosystem in the world now. By realizing a revenue generation model for long term project success by sharing percentage for the courses sold on the learning platform with course creator. Creating real utility for the token and raising demand of token steadily to achieve optimize price on the coin exchanges through effective use to the fund raised for awareness and marketing of the platform. The only way anyone can use the platform will be by utilizing EduCoins creating real use of the token. The Educoin ecosystem consists of learners, individual course creator, education companies, schools, a charity organization, businesses, token holder and exchanges. Our Strong leaders include technology company CEO and experience team lead in the learning-industry. By building our blockchain with smart contract technology on top of an existing blockchain, namely Ethereum, using ERC20 tokenization mechanics it immediately Increases stability as the network for mining transaction is already established for fast transaction.

description.ko:
블록체인기반 교육 플랫폼

스마트 컨트랙트2)를 활용하여 교육 컨텐츠 및 서비스 공유를 구현

교육 서비스 제공 및 활용, 교육 연구 및 개발 자료 공유, 강의 평가, 그리고 정보 불균형과 교육에서의 공평함을 지향

Huobi Labs의 지원을 받아 개발이 진행되고 있는 프로젝트이며, 중국의 주요 블록체인 관련 투자 전문 업체의 지원을 받고 있습니다. 기존 교육 제공 플랫폼이 부담하는 상당한 액수의 마케팅 지출(약 전채 매출의 50%)과 그에 기인한 교육 품질 하락의 우려 그리고 사용자가 지출하는 교육비의 증가에 대한 문제를 해결하는데 중점을 두고 개발 진행 중인 프로젝트 입니다.

교육 컨텐츠 제공자와 사용자 사이의 P2P 환경을 구축하고 컨텐츠는 체인 상에 분산저장되어 위조 및 변조가 불가능하게 설계되며 블록체인의 장점인 투명성을 활용한 컨텐츠 채널을 제공한다는 것에 큰 의의를 두고 있습니다.
description.ar: Educoin is a decentralized online skill learning platform for learners to improve their professional skills in future technologies. Educoin is building the future for online education and professional development with blockchain technology. We are creating an online Learning platform integrated with EduCoin to cut out the traditional payment method that usually has high exchange/transfer fee. And also to reach people in the world that do not have access to conventional payment method but do have crypto wallets. We aim to create financial benefits for the whole crypto and education ecosystem in the world now. By realizing a revenue generation model for long term project success by sharing percentage for the courses sold on the learning platform with course creator. Creating real utility for the token and raising demand of token steadily to achieve optimize price on the coin exchanges through effective use to the fund raised for awareness and marketing of the platform. The only way anyone can use the platform will be by utilizing EduCoins creating real use of the token. The Educoin ecosystem consists of learners, individual course creator, education companies, schools, a charity organization, businesses, token holder and exchanges. Our Strong leaders include technology company CEO and experience team lead in the learning-industry. By building our blockchain with smart contract technology on top of an existing blockchain, namely Ethereum, using ERC20 tokenization mechanics it immediately Increases stability as the network for mining transaction is already established for fast transaction.
